backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a chatroom application with message storage, user profiles, reactions, access control, blob storage for media uploads, and HTTP outcalls functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components including routing, chat UI, message handling, media support, voice recording, avatar management, and query hooks with aggressive refetch strategies.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with cache-busting meta tags, viewport configuration for mobile, and versioned script tag for forcing production refreshes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with lobby, chatroom, and admin routes, conditional header/footer rendering, theme provider, and 404 handling.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component for selecting avatars via file upload or Giphy search with debounced search, trending GIFs fallback, and avatar removal functionality.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface with collapsible header, pinned video area, scrollable message list with auto-scroll on new messages, reply context handling, and message filtering to hide Creator messages without media.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with thumbnail previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, showing live status, participant count, message count, and formatted timestamps. Fetches Twitch thumbnails and Twitter oEmbed previews on mount.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Dialog for creating new chatrooms with topic, description, category selection, and media upload (image/video/Twitter). Validates YouTube and Twitch URLs, handles image uploads with progress tracking, and loads Twitter widgets for post previews.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and a link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with logo, back-to-lobby button (when in chatroom), avatar picker, and inline username editing with character limit progress bar. Manages navigation and user profile updates.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Intentional no-op placeholder component that renders nothing, with comments explicitly stating authentication must not be introduced and the app works anonymously.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with avatar, timestamp, reactions, media embeds (YouTube/Twitch/Twitter), voice playback, pin/unpin controls, and reply functionality. Handles reaction management and Twitter widget loading.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Chat input component with textarea for text messages, media attachment tabs (image/video/Twitter), voice recording with timer, file upload with progress, and URL validation for YouTube/Twitch/Twitter links.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned video (YouTube or Twitch) in an iframe with an unpin button. Renders video embeds based on media type and URL validation.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React component that renders an audio player with waveform visualization, play/pause controls, and a progress slider. Handles audio playback state, duration tracking, and ensures only one audio plays at a time across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state. Invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom hook that debounces a value by delaying updates until a specified delay period has passed without changes. Returns the debounced value with a default delay of 300ms.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Custom hook that ensures chatrooms are freshly fetched when the actor becomes ready by purging legacy cache entries and empty arrays. Provides recovery state signaling and resets on actor instance changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flows and identity persistence. Exports useInternetIdentity hook and InternetIdentityProvider component with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for chatroom and message operations including fetching, searching, filtering by category, creating, sending messages, and managing reactions. Includes helper functions for username/userId management and query key normalization.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file with Tailwind directives, CSS custom properties for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, and mobile-specific styles. Includes voice message player range input styling and viewport height fixes for mobile.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Frontend configuration constants for Giphy API integration, defining the API key and result limit.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility function that formats numbers into compact notation (k, M, B) for display, handling both number and bigint types.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from the Giphy API, returning structured GIF data with preview and original URLs.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for dynamic html2canvas library loading.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and recompresses images using canvas, preserving orientation and only returning compressed version if smaller than original.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter embed rendering functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON data and extracts safe preview fields (author, text, image) without DOM manipulation, with caching and request deduplication.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed preview data with validation, expiration (7 days), and versioning.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail generation functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail caching functionality.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting video IDs and generating thumbnail URLs for YouTube, Twitch (clips/VODs/live), and Twitter/X posts, plus URL type detection.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page for managing and deleting chatrooms, protected by password authentication stored in sessionStorage, with filtering and bulk operations support.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Displays a single chatroom page with loading states, error handling, and view count incrementing. Renders the ChatArea component once chatroom data is loaded.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Main lobby page that displays a list of chatrooms with search, category filtering, and create dialog functionality. Implements client-side filtering and handles loading/error states.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking feature requests to hide Creator messages in chatroom cards for rooms created without media (image, video, or X post).
